title: FS/FT:  Wajo both poses, and Bull Durham
author: bounce

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  Wajo both poses, and Bull Durham
posts.post_content:
Would like to consolidate my collection a bit, so making these available.

Also have a thread in the "E" section with some really nice mid grade Cracker Jacks.

Prefer to sell, but I might consider trading depending on what it is.

"I'll take it" trumps any negotiations, all are priced but I will consider offers.

Prices are delivered via priority mail just to keep things easy. If regular Paypal, add another 3% for the fees.

Have these available:
Walter Johnson portrait Piedmont 350 - BVG 5 - $OLD
Walter Johnson pitching Old Mill - SGC 60 - $3200
Bull Durham Piedmont 150 - PSA 3.5 - $210

George Davis Sweet Caporal 150 Fact 649 Overprint - SGC 4 - $OLD
Bobby Wallace Piedmont 150 - PSA 4.5 - $OLD
Joe Tinker Hands on Knees Sovereign 350 - PSA 3 - $OLD
Rube Marquard Piedmont 350 - PSA 5 - $OLD
George Davis Piedmont 150 - PSA 4 - $OLD

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Sold a couple, marked some other down a little

I supposed I would consider trading, if that's preferable

LMK
